author: Hojojicek
title: Very cute, but do not really do a lot...
review:
This expansion pack is actually super cute. Visually stunning (especially on Luigi), the new hat part is very nice and unusual. It also makes funny sounds when put on.

On the other hand, it does not really add a lot to the gameplay, as it only generates some extra coins from jumping (furthermore I did not really master this ability).

The value per money is obviously super bad with all of those...
